rooms.description: An expansive living room with Art Deco style detailing and a central open space connecting to the courtyard.
A functional dining area integrated with the living room for social gatherings. Features include classic Art Deco furniture and lighting fixtures.
Dedicated office space designed for productivity with a separate entrance ensuring privacy and sound insulation.
Modern kitchen with Art Deco accents that blends seamlessly into the living area. Includes ample counter space and storage in compliance with local building norms.
Connects different zones of the apartment; designed to ensure smooth traffic flow in line with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance positioned at north-east for auspicious energy as per Vastu. Provides direct access to the living areas and courtyard.
Provides connectivity from interior spaces to the central courtyard, ensuring natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with private balcony and bathroom. Incorporates Art Deco styling with elegant fixtures and Vastu-compliant layout for restful energy.
Second bedroom designed with sufficient space for personal relaxation and storage. Layout adheres to Vastu norms to enhance positive energy flow.
Bathroom facilities serving the two bedrooms, designed with modern fixtures, ensuring privacy and proper ventilation in accordance with local building codes.
Dedicated home theater area on the upper level. Equipped with state-of-the-art audio-visual systems and acoustic treatment for an immersive experience.

openings.description: Balcony overlooking the courtyard, providing a serene outlook while maintaining privacy and enhancing Vastu harmony.
Staircase connecting to the ground floor. Designed with safety features and adherence to building norms.
